channel.title: Dark Times 2.0 - Free Website Template Release *ANIMATED*

This is the first template in awhile that I have released. It took around 6 hours to make. It is built with Bootstrap. item.title: Dark Times 2.0 - Free Website Template Release *ANIMATED*
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:8, topic:524404”][quote author=RevengePK link=topic=642947.msg4329849#msg4329849 date=1373491644]
You’re only criticizing my hr method because RSC pointed it out once.
[/quote]

Actually I pointed it out first :p[/quote]You pointed out something totally redundant. It honestly depends on how I feel and what I’m using it for, but I think it requires less code (styling) in general to use a div instead of an hr (especially when it’s used to fix floating div problems).

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Times 2.0 - Free Website Template Release *ANIMATED*
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:4, topic:524404”]There is no way I’m signing up for your forums just to download this.

Edit: Vain_ gave me the link and just by looking through this code I’m wondering why you’re still coding like this.

and all this internal styling[/quote]

You’re only criticizing my hr method because RSC pointed it out once. I could not over power the

styling for Bootstrap and I got pissed so I made a simple div. Yes, I could have made an hr class but I didn’t feel like it. You do realize these templates are free, there is nothing functionally wrong with using a div instead of the standard hr tag, yes using the hr tag would be better but I simply didn’t feel like it.

There is no way I’m signing up for your forums just to download this.

Then…? Don’t…? If you want the code ask for it, I will gladly post it.

Internal Styling

I’d rather refer to it as internal alignment, I use style directly on tags that I feel don’t need a whole new class name. This is the way I code, yes it could be better.

Would I code a website for a client like this? No.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Times 2.0 - Free Website Template Release *ANIMATED*
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

This is the first template in awhile that I have released. It took around 6 hours to make. It is built with Bootstrap.

a90df1c6e304a1fd755e11caf022e8a9.png1083×977

Demo…
Download…

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
		<title>DarkTimes 2.0 Free RSPSDesigns Website Template</title>
		<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
		<!-- Bootstrap -->
		<link href="css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet" media="screen">
		<link rel="Stylesheet" type="text/css" href="css/custom.css" media="screen" />
		<script type="text/javascript">jQuery.noConflict();</script>
				<script type="text/javascript" src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-latest.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			var intval = null;
			var pos = 0;
			$(document).ready(function() {
				intval = window.setInterval(moveBg, 70);
			});
			function moveBg() {
				pos++;
				$("#outter").css({backgroundPosition: (pos * 1) + "px 0px"});
			}
		</script>
		<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lobster+Two' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
		<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
    </head>
    <body>
		<div class="navbar navbar-fixed-top navbar-secondary">
			<div class="container">
				<ul class="nav">
					<li><a href="#"><i class="icon-user icon-white"></i> Login</a></li>
					<li><a href="#"><i class="icon-time icon-white"></i> Register</a></li>
				</ul>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div id="outter">
			<div class="container inner">
				<h1 class="logo"><a href="index.html" class="logo">DarkTimes 2.0</a></h1>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="primary-nav">
			<div class="container">
				<div class="navbar">
					<a class="brand" href="#"><i class="icon-home icon-white" style="margin-top: 3px;"></i></a>
					<ul class="nav">
						<li><a href="#">Home</a></li>
						<li class="divider-vertical primary"></li>
						<li><a href="#">Forum</a></li>
						<li class="divider-vertical primary"></li>
						<li><a href="#">Play</a></li>
						<li class="divider-vertical primary"></li>
						<li><a href="#">Vote</a></li>
						<li class="divider-vertical primary"></li>
						<li><a href="#">Donate</a></li>
						<li class="divider-vertical primary"></li>
					</ul>
					<form class="navbar-form pull-right" style="margin-top: 2px;">
						<input type="text" class="span2 nav-form" placeholder="Enter a term...">
						<button type="submit" class="btn btn-mini btn-info">Submit</button>
					</form>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="container main-cont">
			<div class="left">
				<div class="title">Server Status</div>
				<div class="title-body">
					<div class="server-cell">Server One <span class="label label-success status">Online</span></div>
					<div class="server-cell alt">Server Two <span class="label label-important status">Offline</span></div>
					<div class="server-cell">Server Three <span class="label label-success status">Online</span></div>
					<div class="server-cell alt" style="border-bottom: none !important;">Server Four <span class="label label-info status">Updating</span></div>
				</div>
				<div class="hr"></div>
				<div class="title">Recent Forum Posts</div>
				<div class="title-body">
					<div class="server-cell">
						<img src="http://placehold.it/50x50" class="img-circle" style="float: left; margin-right: 20px;"/>
						<p><a href="#">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</a></p>
					</div>
					<div class="server-cell alt">
						<img src="http://placehold.it/50x50" class="img-circle" style="float: left; margin-right: 20px;"/>
						<p><a href="#">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</a></p>
					</div>
					<div class="server-cell">
						<img src="http://placehold.it/50x50" class="img-circle" style="float: left; margin-right: 20px;"/>
						<p><a href="#">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</a></p>
					</div>
					<div class="server-cell alt" style="border-bottom: none !important;">
						<img src="http://placehold.it/50x50" class="img-circle" style="float: left; margin-right: 20px;"/>
						<p><a href="#">Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</a></p>
					</div>
				</div>
				<div class="hr"></div>
				<div class="title">Advertisement</div>
				<div class="title-body" style="text-align: center;">
					<br />
					<img src="http://placehold.it/120x250" alt="Advertisement" /><br /><br />
					<img src="http://placehold.it/120x250" alt="Advertisement" /><br /><br />
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="right">
				<div class="well-right">
					<h1>Welcome</h1>
					<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
				</div>
				<div class="floats" style="margin-left: 0;">
					<img src="http://placehold.it/100x100" alt="placehold.it" />
					<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
				</div>

					<img src="http://placehold.it/100x100" alt="placehold.it" />
					<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>

					<img src="http://placehold.it/100x100" alt="placehold.it" />
					<p>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</p>
				</div>
				<div class="clearfix"></div>
